targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("heap") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("heap.used") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("nonheap.committed")  FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("nonheap.used") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("threads") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT LAST("young.gc.count") -FIRST("young.gc.count") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) and time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT LAST("young.gc.time") -FIRST("young.gc.time") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) and time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT LAST("old.gc.count") -FIRST("old.gc.count") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) and time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT LAST("old.gc.time") -FIRST("old.gc.time") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) and time > now() - 1h GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("young.gc.count") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("old.gc.count") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("young.gc.time") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("old.gc.time") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("nonheap.used") FROM "microservice_status" WHERE ("serviceId" =~ /^$app$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Aplicacion
list.name: app
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "microservice_status" WITH KEY = "serviceId"
